Allow me to be the intense young man for a moment to say
that I honestly believe this is a rare and unusual
opportunity to build one fine program of ETV. They
appear to have the equipment and the backing to do it
right. Bob Schenkkan seems to be a strong and able
leader and a man I could work well with.
I really want this job - even though the future with
Welton Becket is an exceptionally promising one, it's
not the product I want to create or sell. I want the
chance to build programs of especially high quality
both in content and production. A University such as
Texas is an ideal place to do so - for my money.
If you have any suggestions as to how further the
process of getting this job, I'd be delighted to hear
them.
I look forward to seeing you again, Bill - hoping the
interval of time will be shorter than before.
Cordially,
ROBERT L. DAVY
